title: Emmanuel Mensah Final Act of Heroism
subtitle: Emmanuel Mensah was a United States Army soldier and an immigrant from Ghana who died saving the lives of his neighbours during the Bronx 2017 fire.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: A Ghanaian immigrant and a private person in the United States army, Emmanuel Mensah, died after saving multiple lives in an apartment in Bronx that was set on fire.
